article_title: The Rich Are Finally Paying More In Taxes

article_metadata.author: Tax Analysts

og.description: The centerpiece of President Obama's tax platform has always been that wealthy taxpayers should be paying more. He ran on it in 2008, and his budgets and tax reform plans have always featured new revenues from higher-income individuals (or multinationals). Although much of his agenda has foundered, Obama has gotten his wish in this area on the individual side.
